name: euphorbia marginata
description: New!  An annual - it will complete its life cycle in 1 growing season and then re-seed. Most members of the Euphorbia (Spurge) family have a milky sap in the stem that will irritate eyes and mouth if it comes in contact. For this reason, it is deer and rabbit resistant.
features: Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
